name: Abdullah Sajid
title: Software Engineer
description: Software engineer with experience building and scaling full-stack applications across web, mobile, and desktop platforms. I focus on creating reliable, maintainable solutions that solve real-world problems. Skilled at working across tech stacks and delivering products that are built to last.

experience.title: Freelance Full Stack Developer

projects.name: Techlinkhub
description: Create and share digital resumes with a shareable link
Customize user profiles
Create and manage organizations and posts
Real-time chat functionality
Secure payments through Stripe
Frontend: React.js, Redux Toolkit, React Query, Socket io, Tailwind CSS
Backend: Node.js, Express.js, Python, Flask, Scikit-learn, Socket io, Stripe
Database: MySQL
Architecture: Microservices
Deployment: Backend on Azure and frontend on Vercel

projects.name: Twitter Clone

Create accounts and manage profiles
Create posts and interact with them (like, comment).
View and follow other user profiles.
Built with the monolithic architecture.Use State managed with Redux Toolkit

projects.name: Bakery Management System

Supports basic CRUD operations for management
